2025-09-02.content: Policy Controller is now available as part of the standard GKE offering and no longer requires GKE Enterprise. For more details on the removal of GKE Enterprise, see the [GKE release notes](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/release-notes#September_02_2025).

summary.title: Policy Controller Now in GKE Standard
summary.summary: Policy Controller is now included in the standard GKE offering, simplifying access and removing the GKE Enterprise requirement. This change makes powerful policy management more accessible for all GKE users.
